MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Gordon Terrace and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to complete a repair on an underground cable fault located outside 2 Craigie Road, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.47pm on the 2nd of February 2021.
